title: Failed to register the Ethereum service: gap
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.10.9`
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour

Full sync

#### Actual behaviour

```
2021-10-06T07:26:51.610545155+02:00 stdout F WARN [10-06|05:26:51.610] Sanitizing cache to Go's GC limits       provided=4096 updated=1269
2021-10-06T07:26:51.611188086+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:51.611] Set global gas cap                       cap=50,000,000
2021-10-06T07:26:51.639537576+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:51.639] Allocated trie memory caches             clean=190.00MiB dirty=317.00MiB
2021-10-06T07:26:51.639763220+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:51.639] Allocated cache and file handles         database=/data/geth/chaindata cache=633.00MiB handles=524,288
2021-10-06T07:26:55.640069770+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:55.639] Opened ancient database                  database=/data/geth/chaindata/ancient readonly=false
2021-10-06T07:26:55.698791469+02:00 stdout F Fatal: Failed to register the Ethereum service: gap (#1757384) in the chain between ancients and leveldb
2021-10-06T07:26:56.820672978+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.820] Starting Geth on Ethereum mainnet...
2021-10-06T07:26:56.820949232+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.820] Bumping default cache on mainnet         provided=1024 updated=4096
2021-10-06T07:26:56.820949232+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.820] Enabling metrics collection
2021-10-06T07:26:56.824947226+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.824] Enabling stand-alone metrics HTTP endpoint address=127.0.0.1:8080
2021-10-06T07:26:56.825197869+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.824] Starting metrics server                  addr=http://127.0.0.1:8080/debug/metrics
2021-10-06T07:26:56.832226470+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.832] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
2021-10-06T07:26:56.832432799+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.832] Smartcard socket not found, disabling    err="stat /run/pcscd/pcscd.comm: no such file or directory"
2021-10-06T07:26:56.834435889+02:00 stdout F WARN [10-06|05:26:56.834] Sanitizing cache to Go's GC limits       provided=4096 updated=1269
2021-10-06T07:26:56.835060302+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.834] Set global gas cap                       cap=50,000,000
2021-10-06T07:26:56.865512898+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.864] Allocated trie memory caches             clean=190.00MiB dirty=317.00MiB
2021-10-06T07:26:56.865737727+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:26:56.865] Allocated cache and file handles         database=/data/geth/chaindata cache=633.00MiB handles=524,288
**2021-10-06T07:27:00.896566965+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:00.896] Opened ancient database                  database=/data/geth/chaindata/ancient readonly=false**
**2021-10-06T07:27:00.948608556+02:00 stdout F Fatal: Failed to register the Ethereum service: gap (#1757384) in the chain between ancients and leveldb**
2021-10-06T07:27:02.058396528+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.057] Starting Geth on Ethereum mainnet...
2021-10-06T07:27:02.058658542+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.058] Bumping default cache on mainnet         provided=1024 updated=4096
2021-10-06T07:27:02.058658542+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.058] Enabling metrics collection
2021-10-06T07:27:02.061021309+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.060] Enabling stand-alone metrics HTTP endpoint address=127.0.0.1:8080
2021-10-06T07:27:02.061244490+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.060] Starting metrics server                  addr=http://127.0.0.1:8080/debug/metrics
2021-10-06T07:27:02.068185944+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.068] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
2021-10-06T07:27:02.068367811+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.068] Smartcard socket not found, disabling    err="stat /run/pcscd/pcscd.comm: no such file or directory"
2021-10-06T07:27:02.069905595+02:00 stdout F WARN [10-06|05:27:02.069] Sanitizing cache to Go's GC limits       provided=4096 updated=1269
2021-10-06T07:27:02.070526009+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.070] Set global gas cap                       cap=50,000,000
2021-10-06T07:27:02.103967305+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.103] Allocated trie memory caches             clean=190.00MiB dirty=317.00MiB
2021-10-06T07:27:02.104185189+02:00 stdout F INFO [10-06|05:27:02.103] Allocated cache and file handles         database=/data/geth/chaindata cache=633.00MiB handles=524,288
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Do a full sync?

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

When submitting logs: please submit them as text and not screenshots.

Looks like your db is fried. Did you have unclean shutdowns? I can't see from the logs because geth is restarting before it reaches the point where it reports the shutdowns.

Can you do a `geth db inspect`?
It crashes. Its on a raspberry 4 4gb. I compiled it from source inside a podman container
`geth db inspect` crashes? Do you have a stacktrace?
